title: Rhadamanthys Stealer Evolves: Adds Device Fingerprinting, PNG Steganography Payloads
description: The threat actor behind Rhadamanthys has also advertised two other tools called Elysium Proxy Bot and Crypt Service on their website, even as the flagship information stealer has been updated to support the ability to collect device and web browser fingerprints, among others.
